item.title: Chennai to Vedanthangal Bird Sanctuary Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Vedanthangal Bird Sanctuary, located in Tamil Nadu, is one of the oldest bird sanctuaries in India. Just 80 kilometers from Chennai, it is a paradise for bird watchers and nature enthusiasts. This sanctuary is home to a variety of migratory birds and provides a tranquil escape from the city’s hustle and bustle. If you’re planning a solo trip, here’s a detailed guide to help you
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
